headline: The Ultimate Growth Stock to Buy With $1,000 Right Now
summary: Palantir was the best-performing stock in the S&P 500 in 2024 -- and perhaps this year, too.

headline: Palantir (PLTR) Expanding in Japan Through Fujitsu Partnership to Drive AIP Adoption
summary: Palantir Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ: PLTR) is one of the fastest growing tech stocks to invest in. On August 5, 2025, the company signed a licensing agreement with Fujitsu Japan to integrate its Palantir AIP platform into Fujitsu’s Uvance framework. The deal, announced publicly on August 19, gives Fujitsu the right to distribute Palantir’s generative AI […]
